title.rendered: Peace, love bind Ukrainian and Russian in unique Dubai

content.rendered: Two expats living in Dubai, Russian Aleksandra Vasileva and Ukrainian Yuliia Hnatenko, have called for an end to the ongoing crisis in their home countries.

excerpt.rendered:
Two expats living in Dubai, Russian Aleksandra Vasileva and Ukrainian Yuliia Hnatenko, have called for an end to the ongoing crisis in their home countries.

Learn More
